重庆海领工程机械市场经营管理有限公司成立，启动建设“中国西部（重庆）工程机械交易租赁中心”开始涉足市场管理业务。

收购重庆旺峰肉业有限公司，丰富了民生产业。

Chongqing Hailing Construction Machinery Market Operation & Management Co., Ltd. was established, starting the building of the “Western China (Chongqing) Construction Machinery Trading Leasing Center” and setting foot in the market management business.

Acquiring Chongqing Wangfeng Meat Industry Co., Ltd., enriching the people's livelihood industry.
